example.text: We must call out the nonsense and remind these unelected bureaucrats who they actually work for--the American citizens who have no interest in paying for their counseling. For our friends at the Fish and Wildlife Service who may be watching this speech, you may want to take that eco-grief seminar now, before we legislate it out of existence.

Cosponsor for HR 932, a bipartisan bill repealing the 1991 and 2002 Congressional authorizations for the use of military force in Iraq. Cosponsor for .115 Establishing a Women's Bill of Rights to reaffirm legal protections to women under Federal law, which will ensure protections for women by clarifying who qualifies as a "woman".

It is not easy, and that is part of what makes it so rewarding. My office is working with the USDA Farm Service Agency, Wool Growers Association, and WY Department of Agriculture to issue a state of emergency for Southern Wyoming to help lighten the burden imposed by drought and recent severe weather.

We must call out the nonsense and remind these unelected bureaucrats who they actually work for--the American citizens who have no interest in paying for their counseling. For our friends at the Fish and Wildlife Service who may be watching this speech, you may want to take that eco-grief seminar now, before we legislate it out of existence.

We must call out the nonsense and remind these unelected bureaucrats who they actually work for--the American citizens who have no interest in paying for their counseling. For our friends at the Fish and Wildlife Service who may be watching this speech, you may want to take that eco-grief seminar now, before we legislate it out of existence.

Over 14,000 pounds of fentanyl were seized along the Mexican border, with much of it originating from China; there is no way to truly know how much has escaped into the nation. We have to secure the border and stem this tide that threatens our very right to life.

We must call out the nonsense and remind these unelected bureaucrats who they actually work for--the American citizens who have no interest in paying for their counseling. For our friends at the Fish and Wildlife Service who may be watching this speech, you may want to take that eco-grief seminar now, before we legislate it out of existence.
